entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Saturday 22 April 2023
